alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Portage, northeastern Waushara and western Waupaca Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waupaca, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waupaca, Amherst, Fremont, Chain O` Lakes-King, Hartman Creek State Park, Weyauwega, Pine River, Iola, Saxeville and King. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
